name: The VOMS Java APIs
body:
The VOMS API can be used for 
- validating attribute certificates (ACs) inside a proxy and reading the attributes (VOMS Fully Qualified Attribute Names (FQANs) or generic attributes)
- contacting a VOMS server in order to get an AC and creating a proxy out of it

## Latest releases

- [2.0.9-1](#someurl)

## Documentation

### User manual

- [3.x branch](https://github.com/italiangrid/voms-api-java/blob/3.x/README.md)
- [2.x branch](https://github.com/italiangrid/voms-api-java/blob/2.x/README.md)

### Javadocs

- [3.x branch](#someurl)
- [2.x branch](#someurl)

tagline: Java APIs to validate and request VOMS attribute certificates
